LanguageData.AMA_ShowSpecialRulesDesc: Shows Options related to general special rules.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowDeepStrikeDesc: "DeepStrike" enables units with this special rule to deploy directly into the heat of battle.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowInfiltrateDesc: "Infiltrate" enables units with this special rule to deploy in hidden positions ahead of the main force.
LanguageData.AMA_ShowWeaponSpecialRulesDesc: Shows Options related to weapon special rules
LanguageData.AMA_AllowRapidFireDesc: Weapons with the "Rapid Fire" special rule shoot twice as many rounds per burst and cooldown is reduced by half when a target is with half of its max range.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowGetsHotDesc: Weapons with the "Gets Hot" special rule have a chance to overheat when fired, this can have varios results, from light burn damage to the weapon exploding.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowJamsDesc: Weapons with the "Jams" special rule have a chance to jam each time its fired, interupting its burst and forcing it into an extended cooldown, this jam can damage the weapon.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowMultiShotDesc: Weapons with the "Multi Shot" special rule function like shotguns, firing a cluster of projectiles each time its fired.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowUserEffectsDesc: Weapons with the "User Effect" special rule have a negative effect that have a chance to affect the user each time a weapon is fired/used.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowForceWeaponEffectDesc: Weapons with the "Force Weapon" special rule when wielded by a psyker(Psychically Sensitive) can instantly kill or down their target with a single hit.
LanguageData.AMA_AllowRendingMeleeEffectDesc: Weapons with the Melee "Rending" special rules attacks have a chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AMA_AllowRendingRangedEffectDesc: Weapons with the Ranged "Rending" special rules projectiles have a chance to ignore all armour
